channel.title: Therealejoc - Rainy Nights Remix Challenge
channel.description:
In honor of my song Ring Nights getting a hundred listens on SoundCloud, I would like to present a challenge. Remix my song "Rainy Nights" and post if here (with a few rules of course)
• Track must be in C# • Melody must be the same (or at least pretty darn close) •The main melody must use a AP-001 Piano sound (if you don't have this pack just leave it as is and don't change instruments) •You CAN add new sounds •You CAN change tempo •You CAN add automations to the melody (obviously)
If you want to participate here is the link - https://app.auxy.co/projects/v43Pki2YsnKDnD_3XjM66w==
Have fun!

item.title: Therealejoc - Rainy Nights Remix Challenge
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
In honor of my song Ring Nights getting a hundred listens on SoundCloud, I would like to present a challenge. Remix my song “Rainy Nights” and post if here (with a few rules of course)

• Track must be in C#
• Melody must be the same (or at least pretty darn close)
•The main melody must use a AP-001 Piano sound (if you don’t have this pack just leave it as is and don’t change instruments)
•You CAN add new sounds
•You CAN change tempo
•You CAN add automations to the melody (obviously)

If you want to participate here is the link - https://app.auxy.co/projects/v43Pki2YsnKDnD_3XjM66w==

Have fun!
